鑐字的基本解释

鑐
xū
锁中的簧片。

鑐字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xū］
［《廣韻》相俞切，平虞，心。］
锁簧。
[②]［rú］
［《集韻》汝朱切，平虞，日。］
即襦。短衣。
[③]［róu］
［《集韻》而由切，平尤，日。］
同“鍒1”。
熟铁。

鑐字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鑐； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页1325第09
【廣韻】相俞切【集韻】詢趨切，?音須。【集韻】鎖牡也。或作?。　又【集韻】汝朱切，音儒。金鐵銷而可流者。通作濡。　又而由切，音柔。與鍒同。鐵之耎也。

鑐字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
鑐字的起名意思

锁中的簧片。

鑐
Basic explanation of words
鑐
xū
The reed in the lock.
鑐
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xū］
["Guangyun" Xiangyu cut, Pingyu, heart. ]
Lock spring.
[②]［rú］
["Jiyun" Ru Zhuqie, Pingyu, Day. ]
That is 襦. Short coat.
[③]［róu］
["Jiyun" and Youqie, Pingyou, Day. ]
Same as "Th1".
Wrought iron.
鑐
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Su Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　鑐; Kangxi Strokes: 22; Page Number: Page 1325 Page 09
[Guang Yun] Xiang Yu cuts [Ji Yun] Inquiries are eager, and the sound must be. [Jiyun] Suomu also. Or for?.　[Jiyun] Ru Zhuqie, sound scholar. Those who can sell gold and iron. Pass for 濡.　 But cut again, the sound is soft. Same as thorium. The iron scum also.
鑐

Name meaning

xū, rú, róu
bolt of a Chinese lock
